store_information.comment: Use the contact address for what will show on invoices, use the rest on what will be shown on the store. The store information is based on the "Organizational" section of the schema.org site

department.label: Department
department.comment: This is the location as in "University Unit X"

name.label: Name
name.comment: This is the location as in "Washington State University"

location.label: Location
location.comment: This is the location as in "Third floor" or "First right after light"

streetAddress.label: Street Address
streetAddress.comment: This is the location as in "PO Box 15555" or "1st st."

addressLocality.label: Address Locality
addressLocality.comment: This is the city location as in "Pullman"

addressRegion.label: Address Region
addressRegion.comment: This is the state location as in "WA". note this will be a dropdown later

postalCode.label: Postal Code
postalCode.comment: This is the postal Code as in "99999-9999".

telephone.label: Telephone
telephone.comment: This is the telephone as in "(509) 335-0000".

email.label: Main contact email
email.comment: This is the email you want to display on site. This can be the same as your contact that is used to send of emails from the store.

contactPoint.label: Point of Contact
contactPoint.comment: This is the contact pathway as in "http://contactpage.wsu.edu". It should be noted that it will not be checked that the information is a url or a name.

url.label: Display url
url.comment: This is the url you want to present for the store or your main site.

toplinks_break_position.label: Position of Additional Line Break
toplinks_break_position.comment: E.g. add a line break after the cart drop-down to force other elements of the User Menu to be displayed in the new line (below the cart). Note that elements of the User Menu are aligned to the right edge of the header and are rendered in the following order: cart drop-down, "Compare" block, Top Links, custom static block.

compare.label: Block "Compare" in the Header
compare.comment: If disabled, block "Compare" will be displayed in Magento's default position (left sidebar).

hide_on_mobile.label: Hide Empty Cart on Mobile Devices
hide_on_mobile.comment: Empty cart can be hidden on mobile devices (if browser viewport is narrower than 480 pixels).

aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of the product images (height of the images will be calculated automatically based on width).

alt_image.label: Alternative Image
alt_image.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the main image.

alt_image_column.label: Select Alt. Image By Column
alt_image_column.comment: Which column of the product image gallery will mark alternative images of your products.

alt_image_column_value.label: Alt. Image Column Value
alt_image_column_value.comment: Specify the value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alt. Image By Column is set to "Sort Order", specify the number which will mark (in "Sort Order" column of the product image gallery) alternative images, for example: "2".

column_count.label: Number of Columns
column_count.comment:
Number of products displayed in a single row, if the value of Maximum Page Width is set to 1024 px.
Important: if the value of Maximum Page Width is bigger, the number of columns will be automatically increased to show more products in a row. For example: if the Number of Columns = 3 and the Maximum Page Width = 1280 px, then 4 products in a row will be displayed.

column_count_768.label: Number of Columns Below 768px
column_count_768.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 640 px and 768 px.

column_count_640.label: Number of Columns Below 640px
column_count_640.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 480px and 640 px.

column_count_480.label: Number of Columns Below 480px
column_count_480.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 320 px and 480 px. Below that width products are displayed in a single column.

equal_height.label: Equal Height of Grid Items (Products)
equal_height.comment: If enabled, all grid items have the same height and "Add to cart" button is displayed at the bottom edge of the item.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment:
Emphasize the product on mouse hover over the product.
Important: enable in order to use "Display On Hover" in Display Selected Elements. Otherwise displaying elements on mouse hover over the product will not work properly.

disable_hover_effect.label: Disable Hover Effect Below...
disable_hover_effect.comment: Product Hover Effect will be disabled if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

hide_addto_links.label: Hide "Add to" Links Below...
hide_addto_links.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be hidden if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

centered.label: Align Center
centered.comment: Align center elements of the grid item: product name, price, button etc.

elements_size.label: Size of Elements
elements_size.comment: Control size of the elements of the grid item: product name, button, product labels. If "Default" is selected, size of the elements will be automatically decreased if width of the browser viewport is below 768px.

display_name_single_line.label: Display Name in Single Line
display_name_single_line.comment: If set to "Yes": if product name is too long to be displayed in a single line, it will be clipped and an ellipsis ('…', U+2026 HORIZONTAL ELLIPSIS) will be appended at the end of the line to represent clipped text. This will only take effect if the field Name is set to "Display".

display_addtolinks.label: "Add to" Links
display_addtolinks.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links. Otherwise, links will be displayed as simple icons above the product image.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Simple Icons
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links with icons.

product_page.label: Product Page
product_page.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the product page columns (Image Column, Primary Column, Secondary Column) is specified in grid units. Sum of all columns has to be equal 12 grid units. Otherwise default values will be used.

image_column.label: Image Column Width
image_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 4 and 6).

primary_column.label: Primary Column Width
primary_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 3 and 8).

secondary_column.label: Secondary Column Width
secondary_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 6). Leave empty to remove this column.

replace_upsell.label: Up-sell Products
replace_upsell.comment: To replace Up-sell Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_upsell

replace_related.label: Related Products
replace_related.comment: To replace Related Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_related

related_count.label: Number of Visible Products
related_count.comment: Number of related products displayed in each slide.

product_slider.label: Product Sliders
product_slider.comment: This section is related to product sliders. "Speed" will be applied for all existing product sliders, also on product page. Other settings are only applied to Featured Products Slider blocks and New Products blocks.

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the product sliders, specify time (in milliseconds) between slide transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

move_items.label: Move Items
move_items.comment: Number of items that should move on animation. Enter 0 to move all visible items.

magento_blocks.label: Default Magento Blocks
magento_blocks.comment: In this section you can disable default Magento blocks.

top_links.label: Top Links
top_links.comment: Links in the header: Accoun, Wishlist, Log In etc.

sidebar_blocks_home.label: Disable Sidebar Blocks (On Home Page)
sidebar_blocks_home.comment: In this section you can disable blocks which are displayed in sidebars. These setting only affect the home page.

install.label: Theme Installation
install.comment:
IMPORTANT:
in case you need the original content of some static blocks or pages
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory:
app/code/local/Wsu/ThemeControl/etc/import/

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_pages.label: Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create CMS pages provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "custom.css" you can use the file "SAMPLE.custom.css" which is located in skin/frontend/themecontrol/default/css directory.

spine_bleed.label: Should the spine area bleed left?
spine_bleed.comment: If disabled, block "Compare" will be displayed in Magento's default position (left sidebar).

button_active_bg_color.label: Button Active Background Color
button_active_bg_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

button_active_color.label: Button Active Text Color
button_active_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

font_size.label: Basic Font Size
font_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_family_group.label: Headings Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Headings Font Family - Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

primary_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
primary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

shadow.label: Shadow
shadow.comment: If set to "Yes", all sections with nontransparent Inner Background Color, will drop shadow.

viewport_bg_color.label: Viewport Background Color
viewport_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

bg_color.label: Page Background Color
bg_color.comment: Background color applied for all sections of the page: header, main content area and footer

stretched.label: Stretched
stretched.comment: If set to "Yes", main menu will have the same width as the main content area.

border.label: Show Bottom Border
border.comment: Border has the same color as Active Background Color.

heading_menuicons.label: Link Icons: drop-down arrows, open/close icons in mobile menu

mobile_link_separator_color.label: Link Separator Color
mobile_link_separator_color.comment: Vertical space between links in mobile version of the main menu. Leave empty to remove separator.

main.label: Main
main.comment: In this tab, you can configure the main section of the page (the section located between the header and the footer).

footer.label: Footer
footer.comment: In this tab, you can configure the entire footer of the page. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sub-sections of the footer. Some of the settings can be overridden in sub-sections.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

max_width_custom.label: Custom Maximum Page Width (px)
max_width_custom.comment: Specify value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix.

show_homelink.label: Show Store Home link in the Nav
